title: 300 - The 6 Six Essential Pillars of a Thriving Creative Practice

...........................................................................................

SPONSORS

...........................................................................................

PATREON
If you’re a podcaster, Youtuber, musician, writer, illustrator... if you’re a creative person of any kind, or simply love one, now is the time to check out patreon.com. Now is the time to join the millions of fans and creators who are changing the way art is valued together.

 

STORYBLOCKS
This episode is brought to you by Storyblocks Video. Story Blocks give you studio-quality 4k stock video without blowing your budget. If you need b-roll, after effects templates, or video motion background you gotta check out Storyblocks Video. Head to storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.

 

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to skillshare.com/creativepeptalk  to get started!!!

 

Jakprints
Get our new 2021 Calendar printed by Jakprints.com AVAILABLE NOW! creativepeptalk.etsy.com
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Taylor Lee Nicholson, Andy J. Pizza, Jason Clark, Dee Silkie, Jenna Luecke, Max Wilkins, Masterminds Connect)

itunes:title: 300 - The 6 Six Essential Pillars of a Thriving Creative Practice
itunes:author: Taylor Lee Nicholson, Andy J. Pizza, Jason Clark, Dee Silkie, Jenna Luecke, Max Wilkins, Masterminds Connect
itunes:summary:
It’s the 300TH EPISODE of Creative Pep Talk!!! AND this episode will not disappoint!!

Tune in to hear what I consider to be 6 of the most essential pillars of a thriving creative practice. These ideas have defined my career, but don’t take my word for it - we also have 6 testimonials in the episode of listeners who have had major breakthroughs from utilizing these ideas!

This was an emotional episode and make sure you stay til the end for a surprise!!

THANK YOU ALL FOR MAKING THIS PODCAST COMMUNITY THE BEST THING EVER!! Here’s to 300 MORE!

Listen & Subscribe on Apple Podcasts
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/creative-pep-talk/id929743897
